Today, we launched a new initiative for all our young people
When the creative youth's spirit meets the new media, it produces a new social, cultural and intellectual reality that can not be ignored
Influences in the social media have become part of the makers of change in their societies, and it is necessary to deal with this reality with wisdom, creativity and positive spirit
It is time for social media to become a stand-alone industry and independent educational specialization, and a new area for the competition of creators and intellectuals
#Arab Award for Social Media will cover 20 active groups on social media in our Arab homeland. We will honor them with their creativity and excellence.
We invite the makers and pioneers of change in the social media to participate in the award http://t.co/pjSRWxdLl9 # Award_English_of_English_Xinhua

Today we launched the #ArabSocialMediaAward, a new prize for social media pioneers and innovators working for good across the Arab world
The #ArabSocialMediaAward honors the most distinguished and influential person or organization in each of 20 categories
Social media influencers are important change-makers in society, a reality to be approached with wisdom, positivity and creativity
This award will highlight successful examples in Arab social media and use them as a basis to maximize the benefits for society
Social media change-makers are invited to apply at http://t.co/pjSRWxdLl9 #ArabSocialMediaAward

The next document that provides for the further development of our cooperation with the European Union was signed.
Our cooperation is very positive and covers various areas. We have an active dialogue.
Our political contacts are very strong and positive, they have a wonderful future. The "Eastern Partnership" Agreement (cont) http://t.co/cJ7Aqslapo
Ensuring fundamental freedoms is one of our government's priorities. Because we are in our country (cont) http://t.co/4U7Jv3QaFo
All fundamental freedoms are provided in Azerbaijan. Free media, free internet.
In our country freedom of assembly, freedom of organization is fully ensured. Freedom of religion is also provided in our country.
One of our greatest assets is to live in peace and solidarity with representatives of different peoples and religions in our country.
The European Union is our main trade partner. About 80 percent of our exports fall to the European Union.

The Greek-Azerbaijani relations are successfully developing in different directions.
There are very good results and successes in political, economic, cultural and energy spheres.
The biggest threat to regional security is the failure of the Armenian-Azerbaijani Nagorno-Karabakh conflict.
The soonest settlement of the conflict will bring peace and cooperation to the region.
The conflict should be resolved within the territorial integrity of Azerbaijan and international law
An important part of our relationships are related to energy security.
The Greek-Azerbaijani relations here are of strategic importance.

Another thing that pleased me as much as the enthusiastic crowd was the historic governor's building. http://t.co/ym4kafacyx
It was built as a governor in 1913 and since then has served as governor.
It made me very happy that this building, which reflects our architectural identity and historical experience very well, is in good condition.
